transcript: gen- tleman, who standing beside his tall and stout partner, Mrya Dmftrievna, curved his arms, beat time, straightened his shoulders, turned out his toes, tapped gently with his foot, and, by a smile that broadened his round face more and more, prepared the onlookers for what was to follow. As soon as the provocatively gay strains of Daniel Cooper (somewhat resem- bling those of a merry peasant dance) began to sound, all the doorways of the ballroom were suddenly filled by the domestic serfs
